overview: Jerry Donahoe is the Managing Partner and Chief Financial Officer of DDK Technology Group. In this capacity he has managed all aspects of several sizable government and commercial projects, conducting requirements analysis, proposal development, negotiations and overall contract management for DDK. Prior to DDK, Jerry was an officer in the United States Navy, serving on U.S. Navy warships. Jerry graduated with a Bachelors Degree in Economics from the U.S. Naval Academy.
